metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30126 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: In Apache Tika, a regular expression in our StandardsText class, used by the StandardsExtractingContentHandler could lead to a denial of service caused by backtracking on a specially crafted file. This only affects users who are running the StandardsExtractingContentHandler, which is a non-standard handler. This is fixed in 1.28.2 and 2.4.0

criterions.comment: tika package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
